title: Ashe riffs on Qiyana
body:
{{champion:22}} "Qiyana, I just realized that you're a princess.  That's SO cute!"

{{champion:22}} "Qiyana, there's one element you don't control:  Ice!"

{{champion:22}} "Princess, meet QUEEN!"

{{champion:22}} *ults Qiyana*  Your quarrel with Piltover is so... pointless."

{{champion:22}} *after winning a trade with Qiyana* "If you start a trade war with The Freljord, you WILL lose."

(I just carried a game as Ashe with a jungle Qiyana, and I didn't get to say any of this in /all chat because they FF'ed at 15, so I wanted to get that out of my system.)

EDIT:  One more

{{champion:246}} I am the shaper of lands, and who are you?  A nobody.

{{champion:22}} In my kingdom, EVERYBODY is somebody.

replies.body: Ashe doesnt either? Its just a bow artifact. Quiyana's is a learned talent. Its not the blade thats doing it.
